did.physloc: This collection is housed in a box containing WLU collections 0190-0195.

userestrict.head: Conditions Governing Use
userestrict.p: The materials from Washington and Lee University Special Collections are made available for use in research, teaching, and private study, pursuant to U.S. Copyright law. The user assumes full responsibility for any use of the materials, including but not limited to, infringement of copyright and publication rights of reproduced materials. Any materials used should be fully credited with the source. Permission for publication of this material, in part or in full, must be secured with the Head of Special Collections.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p:
Preferred citation: [Identification of item], Edwin Luther Green Papers, WLU Coll. 0192, Special Collections and Archives, James G. Leyburn Library, Washington and Lee University, Lexington, VA.
In some cases the citation format may vary. Please contact Special Collections staff to verify the appropriate format.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: Gift of Dr. Edwin L. Green.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Dr. Green was a Washington and Lee University graduate, class of 1892. He received his Ph.D. at Johns Hopkins University and was a professor of Greek at Central University in Richmond, Kentucky.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection contains a stamp dated July 18, 1854; 1891-1892 student handbook for Washington & Lee; four photographs; and various correspondence and articles to and by Dr. Green.
